description.value:
You can jury-rig solutions when you don't have the proper tools on hand. You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repair} damaged items without a repair kit.

If you have the raw materials available, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{Craft} a basic @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.7fSnvJ2xoSfa6JXD]{Caltrop} set, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Ti4gWILk69LPxKuU]{Candle}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wob6DB1FFdWs0mbp]{Compass}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.44F1mfJei4GY8f2X]{Crowbar}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.3tOyV4VZEZhwnAMO]{Fishing Tackle}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.UlIxxLm71UdRgCFE]{Flint and Steel}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ML0GR2cIEdMn2hoD]{Hammer}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5j5KyZsGOfbrJNUZ]{Ladder}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oX39xqMLVB8kNrY0]{Piton}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.fyYnQf1NAx9fWFaS]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ccsgob2TZ7WqTrp7]{Ten-Foot Pole}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Sw7MBLASN3xK4Y44]{Replacement Thieves Picks}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wrpI5z7iWB8XvflQ]{Long Tool} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Zr4PwTEuBLE30kkn]{Short Tool}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8Jdw4yAzWYylGePS]{Torch} without consulting a basic crafter's book.
